Package tetris.resources

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • tetris.resources.Block
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Blockable
    public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
implements Blockable
    A Block is a combination of one or two rectangles to resemble a Tetrimino block. Two blocks only require one rectangle while the others require two rectangles. A block knows its x and y coordinate along with its width and height. If the block requires two rectangles then it also knows its second x and y coordinate along with its second width and height.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Anup Bagali, Teja Kocherla, Kevin Liu, Amit Rajesh
